title: What is Web 3.0?
description: Web 3.0, also known as the Semantic Web, is a concept that refers to the evolution of the internet from a collection of static websites to a more intelligent and interconnected network.

title: What is the Metaverse?
description: The metaverse is a term used to describe a virtual world that is created by the convergence of the physical and digital realms.

title: Why You Should Learn to Code.
description: Overall, learning to code is a smart and rewarding decision that can greatly benefit you personally and professionally.
